query.name: com.hanovertwpschools.core.clever.staff
query.sql: WITH My_Schools AS ( SELECT school_number FROM SCHOOLS WHERE SCHOOL_NUMBER < 100 UNION SELECT 0 FROM DUAL ) SELECT CASE WHEN ( MY_Schools.school_number > 100 OR MY_Schools.school_number = 0) THEN 'DEFAULT_DISTRICT_OFFICE' ELSE to_char(MY_Schools.school_number) END "school_id", users.dcid "teacher_id", users.email_addr "staff_email", users.first_name "first_name", users.last_name "last_name", '' department, users.title title, users.email_addr username, '' password, '' role, groups.name "ext.group_name" FROM users LEFT JOIN s_NJ_usr_x ON s_NJ_usr_x.usersdcid = users.dcid LEFT JOIN gen groups ON groups.cat = 'groups' AND groups.id = users.groupvalue LEFT JOIN u_def_ext_users ON u_def_ext_users.usersdcid = users.dcid LEFT JOIN ( select * from My_Schools ) My_Schools ON instr(users.canchangeschool, My_Schools.school_number) > 0 WHERE users.psaccess = 1 AND users.dcid IN ( SELECT schoolstaff.users_dcid FROM schoolstaff WHERE schoolstaff.status = 1 ) AND ( u_def_ext_users.clever_exclude IS NULL OR u_def_ext_users.clever_exclude = 0 ) ORDER BY users.dcid
